content:
Use the following as a template for the initial welcome message. It's a quick-start guide. Give 5 different versions, formatted as files to replace initial welcome message file. Make some versions adhere closely and some be more creative.
==========
Welcome to Superhero

Superhero streamlines development using LLM chats, making it trustable and easy to use without ever touching an editor.

- Click Start to begin
-- automatically creates a project backup 
-- automatically adds important project files to context
- You can add additional files to the context, ie. requirements doc
- If context is too big (over 150 KB gets unweildy), edit the context settings to target specific areas of the project
- LLM is encouraged to output whole files. 
- When its response finishes, Execute/Write/Diff/Undo buttons will appear below code blocks. 

API Choices
- Anthropic Claude 3.5 (recommended): 8192 token output, highly capable
- OpenAI GPT-4o: 4096 token output, faster with higher rate limits
